title: WeChat Application
description: A chat application with real-time messaging capabilities, built using Node.js and Socket.io.
tech: Python, Flask, WebSockets, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS

title: Eventify - Event/Hackathons Management System
description: Eventify is a platform that allows organizers to create and manage events through a multi-step form with support for FAQs, image uploads, and scheduling, while users can browse, book, and pay for events securely via Razor pay.

title: Orgpulse CLI
description: Developed a CLI tool to fetch and manage GitHub organization data, including repositories and issues, using the GitHub API.Integrated MongoDB for persistence, automatically storing and updating thousands of repositories/issues with upsert operations and checkpointing.
tech: NodeJS, CommanderJS, MongoDB, RestAPI, GitHub API

title: Movies Application
description: A movies platform where users can see latest movies card and search movies.

title: News Application
description: A News platform using OMDB API where users can view the latest news, top stories, and sports updates by applying filters.

title: Pallet Sensing System
description: Pallet Sense is a leader in IoT-enabled smart pallet solutions, providing GPS-equipped pallets that transmit location, timestamp, and temperature data.Provide a Hotspot deviation zone using k-mean clustering for detecting nearby loss pallets. Create a dashboard for hotspot deviation zone and Live data for Pallet Lossing, Accuracy & Entropy in ReactJS.

title: CVgen - AI Resume Generator
description: AI-powered resume builder using LangChain + Ollama.

title: Faculty Appointment Portal
description: Scheduling platform for KJSIT with admin panel.
